message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. Given its value and features, I'm asking for $20,000. I think it's a fair price considering the benefits it will bring to you.
I'm interested in the product, but $20,000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000.

Bob, I appreciate your interest. However, $10,000 is significantly below its true value.  I'm willing to come down a bit to $17,000. This offer reflects the product's quality and the value it will bring to you.
I'm still interested in the product, but $17,000 is a bit high for me. I'd be willing to meet you in the middle at $13,500.
